title: PT 3: Her Boyfriend Just Ruined Their Trip By Doing This!
description:
She was looking forward to going on a vacation with her boyfriend. IT was going to be the perfect one-on-one time for them. And then he ruined everything!
He invited his sister and her kids to join them on the beach. Now she needs ideas to stop them from coming on the trip. What can she do?
